author: Special Correspondent
text:
A flying squad seized Rs. 50 lakh cash from a car that was transporting the amount at Tholkappiyar square in the town on Friday.

The team was conducting vehicle checks to enforce the model code of conduct for the upcoming Assembly election when it stopped the car. The team found Rs. 50 lakh cash inside the vehicle that came from Pattukottai. Official sources said the occupants of the vehicle informed the team that the money was being transported from the Pattukottai branch of a public sector bank to the Madurai branch. As there was no proper documents, the vehicle and the money was seized and taken to the Taluk Office. The team asked the occupants of the vehicle to produce documents. to get back the money.
title: Flying squad seizes Rs. 50 lakh
